snake.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: an animal with a long thin body and no legs, that often has a poisonous bite
snake.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: A snake slithered across our path.
snake.translation[0].note_box[0].section: He warned me there were poisonous snakes in the region.
It is the most deadly snake in India.
I might get bitten by a snake.
The snake hissed at him and opened its mouth.
Just feet from me, a green snake slithered silently across the path.
a snake coils itself around something
The snake coiled itself around the branch.
snake.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if a river, road, train, or line snakes somewhere, it moves in long twisting curves
snake.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The train was snaking its way through the mountains.
The road snaked along the valley far below.
